Name: Majuro Atoll
Description: Majuro Atoll is the capital and largest atoll of the Marshall Islands, home to the country s political, economic, and cultural activities.

Name: Kwajalein Atoll
Description: Kwajalein Atoll is known for its large US military base and its location in the central Pacific. It is one of the largest atolls in the world.

Name: Bikini Atoll
Description: Bikini Atoll is a UNESCO World Heritage site and a former nuclear test site, with historical significance in the Pacific region.

Name: Enewetak Atoll
Description: Enewetak Atoll is known for its nuclear testing history, particularly during the mid-20th century. It is largely uninhabited today.
